templateDmTableSql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_dwd.dwd_event_report_dm_yyyymm (
                                    `timestamp` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL,
									`app_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`app_version_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`channel_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '渠道ID',
									`app_plat_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '应用类型ID',
									`country_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`region_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`carrier_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`connect_type_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`network_type_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`os_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`os_version_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`device_type` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`device_id` BIGINT (20) NOT NULL,
									`manufacturer_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`manufacturer_model_id` MEDIUMINT (9) NOT NULL,
									`event_key_id` int(9) NOT NULL,
									`event_id` varchar(512) NOT NULL COMMENT '事件Id',
									`event_hash_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '事件MurmurHash',
									`event_value` varchar(2048) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '事件值',
									`year` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1900' COMMENT '年',
									`month` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '月',
									`day` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '日',
									`hour` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小时',
									`store_id` INT (9) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '时间id',
									KEY `idx_dwd_event_report_times` (`timestamp`) USING BTREE,
									KEY `idx_dwd_event_report_date` (`year`,`month`,`day`) USING BTREE,
									KEY `idx_dwd_event_report_store` (`store_id`) USING BTREE,
									KEY `idx_dwd_event_report_appid` (`app_id`) USING BTREE
									) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
insertSelectSql:
INSERT INTO bi_dwd.dwd_event_report_dm_yyyymm (
									`timestamp` ,
									`app_id` ,
									`app_version_id` ,
									`channel_id` ,
									`app_plat_id` ,
									`country_id` ,
									`region_id` ,
									`carrier_id` ,
									`connect_type_id` ,
									`network_type_id` ,
									`os_id` ,
									`os_version_id` ,
									`device_type` ,
									`device_id` ,
									`manufacturer_id` ,
									`manufacturer_model_id` ,
									`event_key_id` ,
									`event_id` ,
									`event_hash_id` ,
									`event_value` ,
									`year` ,
									`month` ,
									`day` ,
									`hour` ,
									`store_id`
								) SELECT
									`timestamp` ,
									`app_id` ,
									`app_version_id` ,
									0,
									`app_plat_id` ,
									`country_id` ,
									`region_id` ,
									`carrier_id` ,
									`connect_type_id` ,
									`network_type_id` ,
									`os_id` ,
									`os_version_id` ,
									`device_type` ,
									`device_id` ,
									`manufacturer_id` ,
									`manufacturer_model_id` ,
									`event_key_id` ,
									`event_id` ,
									`event_hash_id` ,
									`event_value` ,
									`year` ,
									`month` ,
									`day` ,
									`hour` ,
									`store_id`
								FROM
									bi_ods.ods_app_event_report a
								WHERE
									1 = 1
								AND `store_id` = ${store_id}
delete_yes_date: delete from bi_dwd.dwd_event_report_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND store_id = ${statisDate}
delete_date: delete from bi_dwd.dwd_event_report_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND store_id < ${statisDate}
